00018 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 // Variables to keep track of the CPU usage.
00020 // (Actually, we are keeping track when the CPU is idle.)
00021 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 
00023 volatile int cpu_usage = 0; // in promilles
00024 
00025 static volatile ulong dIdleTick = 0;
00026 
00027 extern "C" void vApplicationIdleHook( void )
00028 {
00029     ++dIdleTick;
00030     }
00031 
00032 static inline void Calc_CPU_Usage_Every1s( void )
00033 {
00034     static ulong lastTick = 0;
00035     static long maxTick = 1;
00036     
00037     ulong curTick = dIdleTick;
00038     long delta = curTick - lastTick;
00039     lastTick = curTick;
00040     
00041     if ( delta > maxTick )
00042         maxTick = delta;
00043     
00044     cpu_usage = int( double( maxTick - delta ) * 1000.0 / maxTick ); 
00045     }
00046 
00047 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 // TC0: 1ms Timer keeping dTimerTick
00049 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 
00051 volatile ulong dTimerTick = 0;
00052 
00053 // Called when a timer tick occurs (every 1 ms).
00054 //
00055 void ISR_Timer0( void )
00056 {
00057     ++dTimerTick;
00058     
00059     (void) AT91C_BASE_TC0->TC_SR; // Clear interrupt
00060     AT91F_AIC_AcknowledgeIt( AT91C_BASE_AIC );
00061     }
00062 
00063 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 // Main Timer task: Drives status LED and keeps track of CPU Usage
00065 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 
00067 portTASK_FUNCTION( MainTimer_Task, pvParameters )
00068 {
00069     (void) pvParameters; // The parameters are not used.
00070 
00071     taskENTER_CRITICAL ();
00072 
00073     TRACE_INFO( "Main Timer task\n" );
00074 
00075     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00076     // Configure Timer 0: 1 ms precision
00077     //
00078     AT91F_TC0_CfgPMC ();
00079     AT91C_BASE_TC0->TC_CMR = AT91C_TC_WAVE | AT91C_TC_WAVESEL_UP_AUTO;
00080     AT91C_BASE_TC0->TC_IER = AT91C_TC_CPCS;
00081 
00082     AT91F_AIC_ConfigureIt
00083     ( 
00084         AT91C_BASE_AIC,
00085         AT91C_ID_TC0,
00086         AT91C_AIC_PRIOR_LOWEST,
00087         0,
00088         ISR_Wrapper_Timer0
00089         );
00090     AT91F_AIC_EnableIt( AT91C_BASE_AIC, AT91C_ID_TC0 );
00091 
00092     AT91C_BASE_TC0->TC_RC = ( AT91C_MASTER_CLOCK / 2 ) / 1000;
00093     AT91C_BASE_TC0->TC_CCR = AT91C_TC_CLKEN;
00094     AT91C_BASE_TC0->TC_CCR = AT91C_TC_SWTRG;
00095     
00096     taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
00097 
00098     vTaskDelay( 1 ); // Allow ISR_Timer0 to work at least 1 tick
00099 
00100     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00101     // We need to initialize xLastFlashTime prior to the first call to vTaskDelayUntil ()
00102     //
00103     portTickType tLastFlashTime = xTaskGetTickCount ();
00104 
00105     // Loop exactly every 1000 ms
00106     //
00107     for(;;)
00108     {
00109         static bool once_only = true;
00110         
00111         // Delay for 900 ms the flash period then turn the LED on
00112         vTaskDelayUntil( &tLastFlashTime, 900 / portTICK_RATE_MS );
00113         if ( once_only )
00114         AT91F_PIO_ClearOutput( LED_PIO, LED_POWER ); //LED on
00115         if ( once_only ) once_only = false;
00116         
00117         if ( xpi.IsFpgaOK () )
00118         {
00119             // Set green LED and clear yellow and red LED
00120             //
00121             taskENTER_CRITICAL ();
00122             FPGA_BegWrite ();
00123             FPGA_Write( XPI_W_PAGE_ADDR, 0 ); // Page 0
00124             FPGA_Write( XPI_W_P0_LED_CLEAR, XPI_LED_G );
00125             FPGA_BegRead ();
00126             taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
00127             }
00128         
00129 
00130         // Delay for 100 ms the flash period then turn the LED off
00131         vTaskDelayUntil( &tLastFlashTime, 100 / portTICK_RATE_MS );
00132         // AT91F_PIO_SetOutput( LED_PIO, LED_POWER ); // LED off
00133 
00134         
00135         if ( xpi.IsFpgaOK () )
00136         {
00137             // Set green LED and clear yellow and red LED
00138             //
00139             taskENTER_CRITICAL ();
00140             FPGA_BegWrite ();
00141             FPGA_Write( XPI_W_PAGE_ADDR, 0 ); // Page 0
00142             FPGA_Write( XPI_W_P0_LED_SET, XPI_LED_G );
00143             FPGA_BegRead ();
00144             taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
00145             }
00146         
00147         // Snapshot of the CPU usage
00148         Calc_CPU_Usage_Every1s ();
00149         }
00150     }
